confirmed_facts: Pope Leo 14 will travel to Turkey and Lebanon from 27 November to 2 December 2025.
He will visit the mausoleum of Mustafa Kemal Ataturk in Ankara on 27 November and meet President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
On 28 November he will visit the Holy Trinity Cathedral in Istanbul, meet clergy, and pilgrimage to Iznik for the 1700th anniversary of the Nicaea Council.
On 29 November he will visit the Sultan Ahmed Mosque and hold a mass at Volkswagen Arena.
On 30 November he will visit the Armenian Apostolic Church in Istanbul and then depart for Lebanon.
In Lebanon he will commemorate the 2020 Beirut port chemical explosion, meet President Joseph Aoun, visit the shrine of Maronite saint Charbel Makhluf, and the Marian statue on Harissa hill.

timeline.event: Visit Ataturk mausoleum in Ankara and meet President Erdogan
Visit Holy Trinity Cathedral in Istanbul, meet clergy, pilgrimage to Iznik for Nicaea Council anniversary
Visit Sultan Ahmed Mosque, hold mass at Volkswagen Arena
Visit Armenian Apostolic Church in Istanbul, depart for Lebanon
Commemorate Beirut chemical explosion, meet President Joseph Aoun
Visit shrine of Charbel Makhluf and Marian statue on Harissa hill
